SEARCH
Package entity

Class User

java.lang.Object
entity.User
Direct Known Subclasses:
CareerCenterStaff, CompanyRepresentative, Student
public abstract class User extends Object
Abstract base class for all users in the Internship Placement Management System. Implements common user functionality including authentication and profile management. Serves as the parent class for Student, CompanyRepresentative, and CareerCenterStaff.

User ID formats:

  • Students: U followed by 7 digits and a letter (e.g., U2345123F)
  • Company Representatives: Company email address
  • Career Center Staff: NTU account
All users initially use the default password "password" which can be changed after login

      password - user's password for authentication (default is "password")
